lastSession.summary: v8.1.0: Added auto-update to session-start.sh. When stale plugin cache detected, hook automatically downloads latest from GitHub, updates cache and registry. Falls back to uninstall/reinstall instructions if auto-update fails. Replaces broken claude plugin update command.
completedTasks: Added stale cache detection back to session-start.sh (lost in v8.0.0 rewrite)
Added auto_update_cache() that pulls from GitHub and updates plugin cache + registry
Fixed version check URL for v7.0.0+ subdirectory structure (claude-harness/ prefix)
Replaced broken 'claude plugin update' instructions with uninstall+reinstall fallback
